body:
Repro: `bazel test --runs_per_test=10 //pkg/kubelet/cm/devicemanager:go_default_test`

```console
//pkg/kubelet/cm/devicemanager:go_default_test                           FAILED in 5 out of 10 in 17.8s
```


Errors tend to look something like this:

```console
--- FAIL: TestNewManagerImplStartProbeMode (11.00s)
    require.go:794: 
        	Error Trace:	manager_test.go:275
        	            				manager_test.go:81
        	Error:      	Received unexpected error:
        	            	timeout on stopping watcher
        	Test:       	TestNewManagerImplStartProbeMode
2019/04/28 05:18:38 Starting to serve on /tmp/device_plugin607680073/device-plugin.sock
2019/04/28 05:18:38 Deprecation file not found. Invoke registration
2019/04/28 05:18:38 ListAndWatch
2019/04/28 05:18:38 Starting to serve on /tmp/device_plugin607680073/device-plugin.sock.new
2019/04/28 05:18:38 Deprecation file not found. Invoke registration
2019/04/28 05:18:38 ListAndWatch
2019/04/28 05:18:38 Starting to serve on /tmp/device_plugin607680073/device-plugin.sock.third
2019/04/28 05:18:38 Deprecation file not found. Invoke registration
2019/04/28 05:18:38 ListAndWatch
E0428 05:18:38.495065      16 endpoint.go:106] listAndWatch ended unexpectedly for device plugin fake-domain/resource with error rpc error: code = Unavailable desc = transport is closing
E0428 05:18:38.495314      16 endpoint.go:106] listAndWatch ended unexpectedly for device plugin fake-domain/resource with error rpc error: code = Unavailable desc = transport is closing
E0428 05:18:38.495577      16 endpoint.go:106] listAndWatch ended unexpectedly for device plugin fake-domain/resource with error rpc error: code = Unavailable desc = transport is closing

2019/04/28 05:18:38 Deprecation file not found. Invoke registration
2019/04/28 05:18:38 ListAndWatch
2019/04/28 05:18:38 Starting to serve on /tmp/device_plugin607680073/device-plugin.sock.new
2019/04/28 05:18:38 Deprecation file not found. Invoke registration
2019/04/28 05:18:38 ListAndWatch
2019/04/28 05:18:38 Starting to serve on /tmp/device_plugin607680073/device-plugin.sock.third
2019/04/28 05:18:38 Deprecation file not found. Invoke registration
2019/04/28 05:18:38 ListAndWatch
E0428 05:18:38.507241      16 endpoint.go:106] listAndWatch ended unexpectedly for device plugin fake-domain/resource with error rpc error: code = Unavailable desc = transport is closing
E0428 05:18:38.507390      16 endpoint.go:106] listAndWatch ended unexpectedly for device plugin fake-domain/resource with error rpc error: code = Unavailable desc = transport is closing
E0428 05:18:38.507616      16 endpoint.go:106] listAndWatch ended unexpectedly for device plugin fake-domain/resource with error rpc error: code = Unavailable desc = transport is closing
2019/04/28 05:18:38 Starting to serve on /tmp/device_plugin604681210/device-plugin.sock
2019/04/28 05:18:38 GetInfo
2019/04/28 05:18:38 ListAndWatch
E0428 05:18:38.512287      16 plugin_watcher.go:120] error failed to get plugin info using RPC GetInfo at socket /tmp/device_plugin604681210/server.sock, err: rpc error: code = Unimplemented desc = unknown service pluginregistration.Registration when handling create event: "/tmp/device_plugin604681210/server.sock": CREATE
2019/04/28 05:18:38 Starting to serve on /tmp/device_plugin604681210/device-plugin.sock.new
2019/04/28 05:18:38 GetInfo
2019/04/28 05:18:38 ListAndWatch
```

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a flaky test.
labels.name: kind/flake

title: TestNewManagerImplStartProbeMode in (pkg/kubelet/cm/devicemanager) flakes half the time
